content.description: Route begins near the left side of the West Face of Hooter Rock. Head up past a bolt, then traverse right. Crux occurs at the midpoint of the rightward traverse. The moves are delicate and, because the rock in this area is especially weak and crumbly, tenuous. I would not recommend this route.
content.protection: Four bolts lead to an anchor.
content.location: Joshua Tree National Park, Wonderland North, West Face of Hooter Rock. Rap off, or continue up next pitch.

content.description: Just right of the bolted route "Earth and Sky" is a right slanting crack. Climb this to a bolt (5.10). Then go up and right and then up and left past a second bolt and into a crack which leads to the top. This route climbs good brown varnish for the most part.

climbs.name: Earth And Sky
climbs.fa: Brian Gengler and Jon Regelbugge Mar. 1992

content.description: Pumpy overhanging, not-quite sport bolted climbing.  Worth doing despite an ethical lapse or two.  The moves never get .11, but the pump will make you think they did.

climbs.name: Buck
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, John Shewchuk, Cora, Blitzo and others.

content.description: This is down on the lower right-side of the slab. Climb a low angle crack that passes a roof on it's right side. continue up and left on face, passing a bolt, to the three bolt "Blitzo Crack" belay.

This is a crack or dihedral of sorts located between

Blitzo Crack

and Buck.

climbs.name: Blitzo Crack
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, John Shewchuk, Cora, Blitzo and others

content.description: This crack is near the center of the West Face slab. It's just left of a corner (Cora Door) and a roof. The crack curves right at the bottom, then goes straight up and fizzles out. At the end of the crack, continue up face past two bolts to a three bolt anchor. Rappel or climb another unprotected slab pitch to another two bolt anchor. Rappel.

climbs.name: A Danger To Herself And Others

content.description: The chimney just right of Hooterville Trolley.  The crux is down low.  For the wide-curious.
content.protection: Standard jtree rack plus wide stuff
content.location: Deep gash right of Hooterville Trolley.
